5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

$alt-key

Constant

Summary

A constant that represents the ALT key on the keyboard.

Type

<integer>

Value

$meta-key

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

A constant that represents the ALT key on the keyboard. This is set to the same value as the META key, to deal with the case where the META key is not present on the keyboard.

See also

$control-key, page 239

$hyper-key, page 289

$meta-key, page 311

modifier-key-index, page 312

modifier-key-index-name, page 313

$modifier-keys, page 314
